GPPSetupSceneController_Text_8:
A Pokémon GO Plus + has been found,
but it’s paired and being used with
another device.

Pairing with this Pokémon GO Plus +
will unpair it from the other device.
You won’t be able to retrieve any
sleep data currently on it, and its
alarm settings will be restored to
their defaults.
GPPSetupSceneController_Text_10:
Bluetooth couldn’t be used.
Please enable Bluetooth in your
mobile device settings and try again.
GPPSetupSceneController_Text_11:
The Pokémon GO Plus + was
disconnected. Please try again.
GPPSetupSceneController_Text_12:
The Pokémon GO Plus + is
malfunctioning or something is
preventing communication.
GPPSetupSceneController_Text_14:
Bluetooth couldn’t be used.
Please enable Bluetooth and
location data in your mobile
device settings and try again.
GPPSetupSceneController_NoAcceptionPopup:
In order to use Bluetooth to connect
to Pokémon GO Plus +, the app needs
to be allowed to use location data
and Bluetooth needs to be enabled.
GPPSetupSceneController_NoUsePopup_Text:
The app can’t use Bluetooth to
connect with Pokémon GO Plus +
because it doesn’t have permission
to access location data or because
Bluetooth is disabled. Please allow
access to location data and enable
Bluetooth in your device’s settings.
